snippet: If Avon Products' stock price is any indicator, Coty still has some work to do in persuading investors in the cosmetics company to accept its $10 billion unsolicited bid.
abstract: If Avon Products' stock price is any indicator, Coty still has some work to do in persuading investors in the cosmetics company to accept its $10 billion unsolicited bid.

byline.original: By MICHAEL J. DE LA MERCED

headline.main: Coty Tries to Rally Support for Avon Bid Amid Skepticism
